name: dancer
caption: Dancer

effect.short: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
effect.full: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

flavorText:
When another Pokémon uses a dance move,
it can use a dance move following it regardless
of its Speed.
